entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
